Articles.Content:
This would be cool, because some people would like equipment to not be probes or debris, but have a whole new category called equipment. This would help so you don't have to see them in the tracking station along with probes or debris. Also, Debris are sometimes removed.

Thanks, DMSP

Edited April 1, 2015 by DMSP

Several other categories would be nice.

Spaceplane, satellite would be the obvious ones.
I need to bump this because it would be great!

Several other categories would be nice.

Spaceplane, satellite would be the obvious ones.

YES!!! SPACEPLANE!!! It would be very nice I must say.

Several other categories would be nice.

Spaceplane, satellite would be the obvious ones.

I think "probe" is good enough for satellite, as it's essentially the same icon. Spaceplanes though.

This is a great idea!

I also think that there should be a "equipment" parts tab.(That would get rid of some the utility tab clutter)

I would like the ability to distinguish between small uncrewed machines that are currently en route to somewhere and small uncrewed machines that are in the stable orbit where they'll be forever. "Probe" vs "satellite" would be reasonable, I think.

The ability to sort the Tracking Station craft list (alphabetically, by type, by launch date, by number of crew, by remaining fuel, by mass, etc.) would also be tremendously useful.

How about customizable labels.

Exactly.

That would be epic!
